message.raw:
various small changes:
* added get_available_functions() to the configurator. this determines
  if various math and string functions are available, and if not
  #defines some compatibility functions instead.
* added dReal-dependent dCopySign() and dFMod() math functions.
* changed the defitions of dDOT and dMULTIPLY in C++ so that all
  combinations of float and double argument types are supported.
  this makes these functions of more general utility.
* renamed some rotation functions for consistency:
    dQtoR --> dRfromQ
    dRtoQ --> dQfromR
    dWtoDQ --> dDQfromW
  the old names are mapped to the new ones in compatibility.h.
  docs will follow in another checkin.
  in general, as the API evolves the old APIs will continue to work
  for as long as possible.

message:
various small changes:
* added get_available_functions() to the configurator. this determines
  if various math and string functions are available, and if not
  #defines some compatibility functions instead.
* added dReal-dependent dCopySign() and dFMod() math functions.
* changed the defitions of dDOT and dMULTIPLY in C++ so that all
  combinations of float and double argument types are supported.
  this makes these functions of more general utility.
* renamed some rotation functions for consistency:
    dQtoR --> dRfromQ
    dRtoQ --> dQfromR
    dWtoDQ --> dDQfromW
  the old names are mapped to the new ones in compatibility.h.
  docs will follow in another checkin.
  in general, as the API evolves the old APIs will continue to work
  for as long as possible.
